To bail them out, Nadia has to take a job in Canada, while Yann is forced to stay behind to save the restaurant.  Together, he and the child confront a relentless avalanche of creditors, an uncaring system and the daily grind from which there is no respite…  Yann finally understands that his only chance of salvation lies in joining his lover – as well as reuniting mother and child – by following Nadia to Canada and a better life.","poster_path":"/rbakPCBP4lCbChOxwB9PuB6Aq4w.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[18],"popularity":6.809,"release_date":"2011-11-18","video":false,"vote_average":6.311,"vote_count":119},{"backdrop_path":"/j6sAlNz354qtzvG01LLYF16Uufg.jpg","id":744,"title":"Top Gun","original_title":"Top Gun","overview":"For Lieutenant Pete 'Maverick' Mitchell and his friend and co-pilot Nick 'Goose' Bradshaw, being accepted into an elite training school for fighter pilots is a dream come true.
